name: Light Olive Structured Printed Shirt
description: This White Striped Crew Neck T-Shirt is a timeless classic redefined for modern comfort. Soft, breathable fabric with subtle stripes adds effortless style to your everyday look. Perfect for layering or wearing solo.

name: Black Structured Oversized fit Half Sleeves Shirt
description: Stand out with the Rust Orange Slim Fit T-Shirt, designed for the fashion-forward man. It hugs your form just right and keeps you cool with a smooth, stretchable fabric that moves with you.

name: Mustard And Off-White Checks Regular Fit Full Sleeves Shirt
description: Relaxed and cool, this Oversized Beige Drop Shoulder Tee delivers on both comfort and style. Designed for all-day wear, its drop shoulder cut gives you a modern, laid-back vibe.

name: Rust Floral Crinkled Print Shirt
description: Elevate your casual look with this Navy Blue Typography T-Shirt. Featuring bold print and premium cotton, it pairs well with jeans or joggers for a weekend-ready outfit.

name: Multi Colour Double Pocket Regular Fit Full Sleeves Shirt
description: The Green Washed Effect T-Shirt adds rugged charm to your look. Its unique wash and vintage feel make it perfect for those who like their style with a story.
